alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 6:08PM EST until January 10 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph...mainly at elevations above 4000 feet. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe, Alleghany NC and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Grayson County. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
